mapper.select: SELECT COUNT , A.USER_ID , A.USER_TYPE , B.USER_NAME , A.TITLE , A.CONTENT , A.REPLY , A.TIME , A.WRITER , A.ANSWER , A.ANSWER_TIME FROM QNA_INQUIRE A JOIN MEMBER B ON A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID AND A.USER_TYPE = B.USER_TYPE ORDER BY COUNT DESC LIMIT ${index} , ${amount}
SELECT COUNT(COUNT) FROM QNA_INQUIRE WHERE 1=1 AND REPLY = #{reply}
SELECT SUM(IF(USER_TYPE = '0', 1, 0)) 'ADMIN' , SUM(IF(USER_TYPE = '1', 1, 0)) 'USER' , SUM(IF(USER_TYPE = '2', 1, 0)) 'BUSINESS' FROM MEMBER;
